title: Man I do enjoy dodges every time a game is about to start.
body:
_Queue up for a game, all is well, gets down to 1s before the game starts_
**-Someone dodges-**
Fine maybe they had to go somewhere
_Queue up again, not even 1s into the party_
**-Someone dodges-**
Kids dodging because they didn't get their roll
_Queue up again, gets to 2s before the game starts_
**-Someone dodges-**
*getting angry*
_Queues up again, half a second into the party_
**-Someone dodges-**
**WELCOME TO LEAGUE OF AUTOFILL AND DODGES!!!!**
